titles.title: Federal Maritime Commission Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 1994
To authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1994 for the Federal Maritime Commission, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee On Merchant Marine.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries. H. Rept. 103-93.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 48.

action.text: Mr. Studds moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

bill.summary: 4/29/1993--Introduced. Federal Maritime Commission Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 1994 - Authorizes appropriations for the Federal Maritime Commission. Removes provisions of Federal law setting the amount of a bond indemnifying vessel passengers for nonperformance of the transportation.
